content: brain eater fish hat materials needed worsted weight yarn - two different shades of blue or color of your choice white red black & yellow hooks - 5 5mm for body and 4 5mm for all other parts scissors yarn needle stitch marker abbreviations used magic_ring - magic_ring half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain increase - increase decrease - decrease fo - fasten_off single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet st - stitch each round is joined with a slip_stitch chain 1 at the beginning of each round/row does not count as the first stitch numbers inside are the stitch count for each round body 5 5mm hook in darker shade of blue 1 half_double_crochet 8 into magic_ring slip_stitch to join chain 1 2 half_double_crochet around 8 slip_stitch to join chain 1 3 increase half_double_crochet around 12 slip_stitch to join chain 1 4 half_double_crochet around 12 slip_stitch to join chain 1 5 increase half_double_crochet x2 around 16 slip_stitch to join chain 1 6 half_double_crochet around 16 slip_stitch to join chain 1 7 increase half_double_crochet x3 around 20 slip_stitch to join chain 1 8 increase half_double_crochet x4 around 24 slip_stitch to join chain 1 9 increase half_double_crochet x5 around 28 slip_stitch to join chain 1 10 half_double_crochet around 28 slip_stitch to join chain 1 11 increase half_double_crochet x6 around 32 slip_stitch to join chain 1 12 half_double_crochet around 32 slip_stitch to join chain 1 13 increase half_double_crochet x7 around 36 slip_stitch to join chain 1 14 half_double_crochet around 36 slip_stitch to join chain 1 15 increase half_double_crochet x8 around 40 slip_stitch to join chain 1 16 increase half_double_crochet x9 around 44 slip_stitch to join chain 1 17 increase half_double_crochet x10 around 48 slip_stitch to join chain 1 18 half_double_crochet around 48 slip_stitch to join chain 1 19 increase half_double_crochet x7 around 54 slip_stitch to join chain 1 20 increase half_double_crochet x8 around 60 slip_stitch to join chain 1 21 half_double_crochet around 60 slip_stitch to join chain 1 22 increase half_double_crochet x9 around 66 slip_stitch to join chain 1 23-24 half_double_crochet around 66 slip_stitch to join chain 1 25 increase half_double_crochet x10 72 slip_stitch to join chain 1 26-31 half_double_crochet around 72 st 6 rnds slip_stitch to join chain 1 attach white into any st with a slip_stitch 32 chain 1 single_crochet into same st as chain single_crochet into next two st *half_double_crochet x2 into next st double_crochet-picot-double_crochet into next st half_double_crochet x2 into next st single_crochet next three st* repeat between * * for a total of twelve teeth each tooth should be separated by three single_crochet after the last half_double_crochet of tooth #12 slip_stitch into the first single_crochet fo & weave in ends here you will be switching to red for this round you will be working over round 22 white and into round 21 blue i hope this makes sense the stitches will go over top of the white but will be worked into the stitch holes of round 21 attach red with a slip_stitch into round
